short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customise your new tab page and boost your productivity with Casca Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Casca Extension is a tool with ChatGPT for productivity and collaboration. Customize your new tab, create and share multiple spaces, and maintain a work-life balance with ease. 

Features:

‚Äî Multiple workspaces: create separate spaces for work, personal projects, or hobbies. Keep each workspace organized and switch between them easily
‚Äî Customizable dashboard: personalize your dashboard with widgets and customize the layout to suit your needs
‚Äî Light / Dark themes with automatic switching
‚Äî ChatGPT: get answers, explore new topics, and engage in interactive discussions
‚Äî Change your wallpaper: search for the perfect wallpaper directly in your new tab, or use your own image
‚Äî Website preview: preview multiple links without leaving your current tab. Simply long-press any link to activate a split-screen mode and compare content without switching tabs
‚Äî Sticky notes: place important information anywhere on your dashboard
‚Äî Collaboration: work on projects with colleagues or share spaces with friends. Collaborate in real-time and stay connected
‚Äî Sync: Access your dashboard on multiple devices without having to register

Here are some of our widgets:

‚úÖ Todos: Create and manage to-do lists.
üìù Notes: Write a story, save articles or take notes
üóìÔ∏è Schedule: Efficiently plan tasks and activities
üçÖ Pomodoro: Improve productivity with the Pomodoro Technique, breaking work into intervals with short breaks
üîí Website blocker: Block distracting websites and stay focused
üìë Kanban: Visually organize tasks using interactive cards for effective workflow management
‚òÄÔ∏è Weather: Current weather conditions and forecast for any city
üóÇ Links Folder: Create a folder containing links to your favorite websites
‚òÅÔ∏è Image hosting: Host and share images easily. Generate shareable links for smooth collaboration and image sharing
üñºÔ∏è Embedded Website: Embed any website you want to view in your dashboard
‚è∞ Clock: Display of current time
üìÖ Calendar: Track the day of the month
üìß Gmail: See all unread emails in your Gmail inbox
üîó Link: Save frequently visited websites or important resources
ü§ñ Reddit Media: Browse random posts from your favorite subreddits
üõ†Ô∏è GitHub PRs: Stay informed about the latest pull requests in repositories
üíª LeetCode: Sharpen coding skills with coding challenges and solutions
üöÄ Product Hunt: Discover the latest products and trends in the tech industry
üí° Indie Hackers: Stay updated on innovative projects and startups
üì∞ Hacker News: Get the latest tech news and discussions from the community
üìñ Word of the Day: Expand your vocabulary with a new word and definition every day
And more üòâ

Whether you're working on a project with colleagues or tracking your personal goals, Casca Extension has got you covered!

Casca Extension prioritizes user privacy by not storing personal information. All data is securely stored in the browser storage by default. For more information, visit https://casca.space/privacy-policy/.
